name: Island of Virgins
description:
Island of Virgins - fun game match 3, with the elements of a visual novel. You have to strip 5 hot and sweet girls. Immerse yourself in the fantastic world of Virginia, where swords, daggers, and magic reign. Use your thinking and smash the shackles of crystalline virgins.

Sailor, assistant captain, he is courageous, agile and slim. Sent on his first trip to the sea. A ship named Hades carries his crew through the endless kingdom of Poseidon.
The sea quietly lulled the sailors heart, the low sun was fiery red, a long ridge of heavy clouds gradually covered part of the horizon. The clouds gradually hid the sun, but dim light illuminated the sea covered with waves.
Suddenly a storm began, the waves disappeared behind a wall of freezing rain. It was a terrible noise: the wind roared in the mast and the sails, the rolling waves roared, the waves crashed with a splash, swaying the ship more and more. Incessantly rang and moaned rigging. The excitement grew stronger as the ship moved worse and worse.
Thunder and lightning cut the sky and suddenly ... at one moment lightning, like a spear of Zeus, split the ship in half and the waves swallowed it together with the crew.
After wandering on the wreckage of a wrecked ship, in the balance of death, our hero woke up on an island without memory. What does this island hide in itself, death or a chance for a new life?
